link.title: Woodrow Wilson Elementary - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: All District 155 Schools are closed. Remote Learning: March 17, 2020 through the end of the school year, May 21, 2020. During the closure students can pick up breakfast and lunch from either Wilson Elementary or Wentworth Intermediate School between 9 AM and 1 PM. More Info. ------ eLearning/Remote Learning

div.span: The Calumet City School District 155 staff will strengthen its partnership with children, parents and community to provide an optimum climate for learning in which children may reach their true potential and pursue their life goals.
